comments.body: Using UTC is intentional so we avoid problems like daylight saving.

`.UTC()` only sets the location used when converting the time to a string, it doesn't impact the calculations that happen on the value which is always stored as the time elapsed since Jan 1 1970 UTC, so this is a noop for what we want to do.
